snippet: The nation’s highest court has overturned a decision that would have barred tens of thousands of refugees in neighboring countries from voting in the presidential election.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s highest court has overturned a decision that would have barred tens of thousands of refugees in neighboring countries from voting in the presidential election.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Refugees to Be Able to Vote
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Refugees to Be Able to Vote
